mapper.sql: id, resourcename, iconcls, description, url, seq, rtype, resourceid, cdatetime, udatetime
mapper.insert: insert into resource (id, resourcename, iconcls, description, url, seq, rtype, resourceid, cdatetime, udatetime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resourcename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iconcls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resourceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{udatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into resource
id,
resourcename,
iconcls,
description,
url,
seq,
rtype,
resourceid,
cdatetime,
udatetime,

mapper.update:
update resource
resourcename = #{resourcename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
iconcls = #{iconcls,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seq = #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rtype = #{rtype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
resourceid = #{resourceid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cdatetime = #{cdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
udatetime = #{udatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
